1370: Kerstiaen moved to Muurhuysen2.C.6 after marriage.
Got married to Hildeburgis at age 20 in 1370.
Had a son with Hildeburgis, Frethericus, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Trueb, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Segherarden, at age 22.
Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 1 years old.
1374: Lost son Trueb when Trueb was 4 years old.
1375: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Niels, at age 25.
1384: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Rolant, at age 34.
1386: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Menoldis, at age 36.
Lost daughter Menoldis when Menoldis was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 0 years old.
Hildeburgis gave birth to their stillborn son Ivone in 1387.
1388: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Wouter, at age 38.
1392: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Imma, at age 42.
1395: Lost his wife Hildeburgis while she was giving birth to Woutersoet in 1395.
